entries.npc_1_1: Ahoy there! Ha ha. Have you ever wanted to be a pirate? I know I sure have. I spent over 20 years in the Imperial Navy combating pirates, blowing up ships, and being struck in the head, I found out something about myself! I want to be a pirate! I know where some pirates are if you are interested. Would you like to check them out for yourself?
entries.npc_2_1: Good for you! From what I've been told, This is where they have their base! They arent a very friendly bunch so be careful!
entries.npc_3_1: What could be better than sailing the spacelanes and boarding vessels! HA! It sounds like a great life! Well, you're missing out, I say!
entries.npc_4_1: Hmm? Oh, of course I was hit on the head! What Imperial Naval Captain hasn't been? Why don't you go see for yourself?
entries.npc_backtowork_1: Good for you! From what I've been told, This is where they have their base!
entries.npc_reset: What could be better than sailing the spacelanes and boarding vessels! HA! It sounds like a great life! Well, you're missing out, I say!
entries.player_1_1: Yes! I will go see for myself!
entries.player_2_1: No thanks, I don't want see the pirates.
entries.player_3_1: Did you say you were hit on the head?
entries.player_sorry: I am still looking for them.
entries.waypoint_description_1: According to Boyrake, this is where the Canyon Corsairs are holed up.
